channel.title: Changing skill colors? dumb question
channel.description: The number of my skill level is red, i keep searching through the client, but can't figure it out on my own, and yes i've asked google. So if one of your are kind enough to assist me i will greatly appreciate it :) thanks! - also i would like to make them yellow :)

item.title: Changing skill colors? dumb question
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Open your cache in Lins interface editor or maker… Switch the open interface to your skill tab one and then select whatever text is red, and make it yellow.

Read full topic
